categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: Darth Vader vs. the Rebel Fleet - Fearsome Fighter Pilot
"Darth Vader vs. the Rebel Fleet - Fearsome Fighter Pilot" is the twenty-first episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the StarWarsKids.com and YouTube channel on March 29, 2019.

Darth Vader stalks a rebel convoy in his TIE Advanced x1 starfighter. One of the X-wing pilots informs the commander that they are picking up a ship on their sensors. The narrator explains that in a "galaxy of adventures", Darth Vader is a fearsome fighter pilot.

Darth Vader runs circles around the X-wings, shooting them down one by one. He then takes on the A-wings of Phoenix Squadron, decimating the fighters one by one. The commander wonders how  one fighter can best their entire squadron. Lord Vader then fires several proton torpedoes at the CR90 corvette, destroying it and leaving flaming debris in his wake.
